metadata.title: CVE-2024-46737 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  nvmet-tcp: fix kernel crash if commands allocation fails  If the commands allocation fails in nvmet_tcp_alloc_cmds() the kernel crashes in nvmet_tcp_release_queue_work() because of a NULL pointer dereference.    nvmet: failed to install queue 0 cntlid 1 ret 6   Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at          virtual address 0000000000000008  Fix the bug by setting queue->nr_cmds to zero in case nvmet_tcp_alloc_cmd() fails.
